md.html:
That which is significantly beneficial to the flourishing of a person (in terms of growth, development, progress, evolution, fulfillment, and actualization).

  • Engagement
  • Accomplishment
  • Contribution
  • Autonomy
  • Grit

Potential additions:

  • Vitality (energy, liveliness)
  • Novelty (spontaneity, variety)
  • Character (virtue, wisdom)
